name: Adult Flame Dragon
description: The Adult Flame Dragon embodies chaos and destruction, with an impressive wingspan and smoldering scales. Its presence exudes power, augmented by its fiery breath and blazing attacks.
memorable: It possesses the terrifying ability to instill fear in foes with its Frightful Presence and can wreak havoc with its Fire Breath, causing extensive fire damage.
goals: To dominate its territory, inflict chaos, and destroy its enemies through fire and intimidation.
relations: It may command lesser fire-based creatures and could be associated with other chaotic beings.
environment: Commonly found in volcanic regions, fiery caves, or places associated with intense heat.
strengths: Immunity to fire damage and high durability due to substantial hit points and saving throw proficiencies.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to non-magical attacks and lacks resistances beyond fire damage.
attacks: Utilizes a combination of piercing bites, slashing claws, and bludgeoning tail strikes, alongside devastating fire breath attacks.
most_powerful_ability: Fire Breath, allowing it to exhale a devastating 60-foot cone of fire, inflicting massive damage and potentially causing targets to rampage.
senses: The dragon has blindsight up to 60 feet, enabling it to detect foes in darkness or invisibility.
skills: Excels in Deception, Persuasion, and has exceptional Perception, making it a cunning and observant opponent.
additional_information: Can shift forms to become a fire-based elemental with different capabilities.
Has the ability to knock foes prone with its Wing Attack and reposition itself.
Utilizes Legendary Resistance to avoid negative effects from spells.
